text: Lance Solomon Reddick (June 7, 1962 - March 17, 2023) was an American actor and musician. He was best known for playing Cedric Daniels in The Wire and Phillip Broyles in Fringe. He played Chief Irvin Irving on Amazon Prime's Bosch. He also played Charon in the John Wick movies. Reddick was found dead on March 17, 2023, at his home in Los Angeles, California at the age of 60. The cause of death was heart and coronary artery disease. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:1962 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Deaths from coronary artery disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Actors from Boston
title: Lance Reddick
